name: Glide (Xen98)
description:
Play as a traveling monk traversing a long arduous wasteland  with nothing but his robe, hat, umbrella, and skills.

Controls(computer):

WASD= to move around and jump

Space Bar= to deploy umbrella and glide mid jump  or fall

Wall Jump= jump near or while clinging to a wall

Controls(gamecube controller):

Left Joystick= to move left or right

A button= to jump

R shoulder button= to deploy umbrella mid jump or fall

Wall Jump= jump near or while clinging to a wall
